title: Delete one Account
name: DeleteOneAccount

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access rights needed.
permission.description: Require an authorization valid token in the request.

description: Delete the account that corresponds to the id sent as a parameter in the URL.

Error 404.description: Account not found. Id sent as a parameter does not correspond to any existing account.

title: Get all accounts
name: GetAllAccounts

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access rights needed.
permission.description: Require an authorization valid token in the request.

description: Returns a json that includes all the accounts (accounts path) as an array and a status of the request, success or failed (status path)

title: Get one account
name: GetOneAccount
description: Returns a json that includes the account identified by the id parameter (type path) and a status of the request (success or failed)

examples.title: Example of an Error-Response:

title: Create an Account
name: createOneAccount

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access rights needed.
permission.description: Require an authorization valid token in the request.

description: Creates a new account using the account path inside request body.

Parameter.description: Account name that must be unique. Required.
Account profile types, only supports "customer", "demoCustomer", "partner" and "leadProvider". Optional.
Country code of the entire account. Optional.

title: Delete one Group
name: DeleteOneGroup

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access rights needed.
permission.description: Require an authorization valid token in the request.

description: Delete the group that corresponds to the id sent as a parameter in the URL.

Error 404.description: Group not found. Id sent as a parameter does not correspond to any existing group.

title: Get all groups
name: GetAllGroups
description: Returns a json that includes all the groups (groups path) as an array and a status of the request, success or failed (status path)

Success 200.description: Information about the account that the group belongs to.

examples.title: Example of a Success-Response:

title: Get one group
name: GetOneGroup
description: Returns a json that includes the group identified by the id parameter (type path) and a status of the request (success or failed)

Success 200.description: Information about the account that the group belongs to.

examples.title: Example of an Error-Response:

title: Create a Group
name: createOneGroup

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access rights needed.
permission.description: Require an authorization valid token in the request.

description: Creates a new group using the group path inside request body.

Parameter.description: Group's types, only supports oem, group, store, leadProvider. Required.
The group ID of the parent of this group. The group must exist. Required.
The account ID that the group belongs to. The account must exist. Required.
Group industries, only supports vehicle, insurance, savingPlan, realEstate, retail. Required.
Country code of the entire group. Optional.
Group's language. Only supports es, pt and en. Optional

Example of an Error-Response:

permission.name: admin

permission.description: Require an authorization valid token in the request.

description: Modify the group identified by the id parameter in the url using the group path inside request body.

Parameter.description: Group's types, only supports oem, group, store, leadProvider. Required.
The group ID of the parent of this group. The group must exist. Required.
Group industries, only supports vehicle, insurance, savingPlan, realEstate, retail. Required.
Country code of the entire group. Optional.
Group's language. Only supports es, pt and en. Optional

title: Delete one user
name: DeleteOneUser
description: Delete the user that corresponds to the id sent as a parameter in the URL.

Error 404.description: User not found. Id sent as a parameter does not correspond to any existing user.

title: Get all users
name: GetAllUser
description: Returns a json that includes all the users (users path) and a status of the request, success or failed (status path)

Success 200.description: Information about the group that the user belongs
Information about the account that the user belongs
Unique userName that represents the user, in email format
User's roles, only supports owner, agent, admin

examples.title: Example of a Success-Response:

title: Get one user
name: GetOneUser
description: Returns a json that includes the user identified by the id parameter (type path) and a status of the request (success or failed)

Success 200.description: Information about the group that the user belongs
Information about the account that the user belongs
Unique userName that represents the user, in email format
User's roles, only supports owner, agent, admin

examples.title: Example of a Success-Response:
Example of an Error-Response:

title: Create a user
name: createOneUser
description: Creates a new user using the user path inside request body

Parameter.description: User's username that must follow email format and be unique. Required.
User's roles, only supports owner, agent and admin. Required.
The group ID that the user belongs to. The group must exist. Required.
The account ID that the user belongs to. The account must exist. Required.
User's password. Must have one uppercase, one lowercase, one number and 8 characters at least. Required.
User's defined language. Only supports en, es and pt. Optional.

examples.title: Example of a valid POST request:
Example of an Error-Response:

title: Modify a user
name: modifyOneUser
description: Modify the user identified by the id parameter in the url using the user path inside request body

Parameter.description: User's username that must follow email format and be unique.
User's roles, only supports owner, agent and admin.
The group ID that the user belongs to. The group must exist.
User's password. Must have one uppercase, one lowercase, one number and 8 characters at least.

Error 404.description: User not found. Id sent as a parameter does not correspond to any existing user.
